title: Police investigate alleged sexual assault on young woman by 'famous Irish sports star'
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Police are investigating a famous Irish sports star over an alleged sexual assault on a young woman in Dublin on Friday night.

The alleged incident took place in a pub in West Dublin at around 9pm on Friday evening and the woman is understood to have made a complaint to police on Saturday morning.

Irish police confirmed to Dublin Live that they are investigating the alleged incident.

They said in a statement: "Gardaí in Crumlin are investigating an alleged sexual assault of a woman that occurred, Friday 11th October, 2019 at approximately 9pm on Drimnagh Road, Dublin 12.

"Investigations are ongoing and no arrests have been made at this time."

According to the Irish Mirror, the individual concerned is understood to be the same well-known sports star that is under investigation over an alleged rape of a married woman at a Dublin hotel in December 2018.

A file on that investigation is being prepared for the Director of Public Prosections.
description: The alleged sexual assault took place at around 9pm near a Dublin pub on Friday evening - and is understood to have been reported to police the following morning
